A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I really wanted to like this movie\, but after thinking about it and me and my buddies talking. All I can say is its a movie in a "Star wars" setting. Yes they have dumb things they do in all of them\, but this movie just comes off as boring. The plot is jumbled around\, Ray literally gets more powerful as the plot requires her to without any training(don't give me any of that luke was like that\, really i remember luke getting his hand cut off and the shit kicked out of him till the third movie\, but whatever)\, Finn was fucking pointless\, and that asian girl I cant remember the name of came out of fucking no where.

Extra questions
- Why could she not tell anyone the plan to leave the ship?

- Snoke sucked\, I think we can all agree on that one.
